intelliagent.business: IntelliAgent - AI consulting and automation for Australian businesses. We help companies implement Claude Code, AI agents, and automation workflows.
intelliagent.product: AI consulting services including Claude Code implementation, custom AI agent development, workflow automation, and AI strategy consulting for Australian businesses.
intelliagent.audience: Australian business owners, CTOs, and technical leaders at SMBs (10-500 employees) looking to implement AI solutions. Tech-curious but not necessarily technical.
intelliagent.competitors: Deloitte AI practice, PwC AI consulting, smaller AI consultancies, freelance AI developers
intelliagent.differentiator: Deep expertise in Claude Code and Anthropic's AI stack. Hands-on implementation, not just strategy decks. Australian-based, understands local market. Practical focus on ROI.
intelliagent.goals: Thought leadership, lead generation, establish authority in Australian AI consulting market
